mapper.select: select * from communityLikey where memberNum = #{memberNum} and communityNum = #{communityNum}
select count(*) from communityLikey where communityNum = #{communityNum}

select cl.* from COMMUNITYLIKEY cl,(select * from (select ROWNUM rn,community.* from (select * from COMMUNITY order by COMMUNITYNUM desc) community ) order by rn) c where c.communityNum=cl.communityNum and rn between 1 and 5 and memberNum=#{memberNum}
mapper.delete: delete from communityLikey where memberNum = #{memberNum} and communityNum = #{communityNum}
